tool_description: Analyzes the overall nutritional adequacy of a pet food product by evaluating macronutrient balance, caloric density, and nutritional completeness.

product_id.description: Unique identifier of the pet food product

error_messages: Invalid nutritional values: All percentages must be between 0 and 100
Impossible nutritional combination: Sum of minimum values cannot exceed 100%
Missing caloric information: calories_per_cup must be a positive number
Product ID not found: Ensure product_id corresponds to a valid parsed product
usage: Provide product_id and all nutritional parameters from guaranteed analysis. The tool evaluates nutritional adequacy and balance.

overall_rating.description: Overall nutritional rating: excellent, good, adequate, or poor

dry_matter_protein.description: Protein percentage on dry matter basis

dry_matter_fat.description: Fat percentage on dry matter basis
